pages.text: Bulk $(l)shops$() are not suited for the shopping districts, but bulk $(l)sales$() are totally okay!$(br2)Minimum of 16 stacks (one sack full) of $(o)one item$() is considered a bulk sale.

Bulk sales should be $(l)player to player deals$() conducted via mail or in person, and $(#ff0c0c)$(o)not in an apple crate.$()$(br2)These transactions are not impacted by the shopping district guidelines and pricing can be $(l)$(o)freely decided between players$().
